meanings.definition: To surpass in skating speed or skill.
meanings.sent1: She outskated all her friends at the ice rink.
meanings.sent2: He outskated the competition to win the race.
meanings.sent3: The penguin outskated the seal in a hilarious race on the ice.
meanings.sent4: Her determination outskated any doubts in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The champion outskated the rest with effortless grace.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, she outskated her personal best record.
meanings.sent2: He outskated everyone in the last competition.
meanings.sent3: The tortoise outskated the hare in a surprising turn of events.
meanings.sent4: His courage outskated his fear of failure.
meanings.sent5: The memory of his victory outskated any previous disappointments.
